mapper.select: SELECT products.*, category.category_name FROM products JOIN category ON products.category_id = category.category_id order by product_id asc
select oc.* FROM order_cart oc JOIN products p ON oc.product_id = p.product_id WHERE p.product_id=#{productId}
SELECT oc.*, p.product_name, p.unit_quantity, c.category_name FROM order_cart oc JOIN products p ON oc.product_id = p.product_id JOIN category c ON p.category_id = c.category_id
SELECT DISTINCT delivery_driver.* FROM delivery_driver WHERE driver_idx NOT IN ( SELECT driver_idx FROM driver_schedule WHERE delivery_date = #{expArrivalDate} AND delivery_check = 'Y' );
mapper.delete: DELETE oc.* FROM order_cart oc JOIN products p ON oc.product_id = p.product_id WHERE p.product_name = #{productName}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO order_detail (order_idx, product_id, purchase_price, return_quantity, quantity, receipt_date) VALUES ( (SELECT MAX(order_idx) FROM `order`), #{productId}, (SELECT purchase_price FROM products WHERE product_id = #{productId}), 0, (SELECT order_quantity FROM order_cart WHERE product_id = #{productId}), (SELECT exp_arrival_date FROM `order` ORDER BY order_idx DESC LIMIT 1) )
mapper.select: SELECT o.order_idx, o.exp_arrival_date, d.driver_name, d.car_num FROM `order` o JOIN delivery_driver d ON o.driver_idx = d.driver_idx
SELECT od.quantity, p.product_name, p.unit_quantity FROM order_detail od JOIN products p ON od.product_id = p.product_id WHERE od.order_idx = #{orderIdx}
